tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: "I had a wonderful experience at GC, a very organized, state-of-the art dental clinic. I visited for a tooth decay infection. Dr. Chaitanya's diagnosis is accurate, and he patiently explained the course of treatment. I was apprehensive that the infection & swelling would take long to recede, but with doctor's advice and treatment, I recovered in just 3-4 days. The team of assistant doctors at GC are also skilled and caring, providing detailed explanations of treatments, precautions, and manage follow-up appointments effectively.Thank you.

I visited Dr. Reddy twice, once to get my tooth extracted for poor RCT done by another dentist. He did the extraction completely painless for me.
My 2nd visit to Dr. Reddy was to correct a bridge done by another dentist not properly. I had been suffering from this problem from too long and felt this would never resolve. Im very thankful to Dr. Reddy for handling my case so carefully and understanding my problems. He not only treats the patient but also follows up multiple times with the patient to know if the patient is doing fine. **** *** **** ******* * **** **** ****** ** **********

I visited GC dental Khajaguda branch for dental issues of my father and mother. 

Doctor and entire staff was very polite. Things were told very clearly and were not kept hidden. 

Father had few RCT and was very satisfied 
Mother had some extractions bridge removal and RPD. RPD was not fitting well on the first go but they made other One which was better than the previous one. Second RPD was not charged as first one was not fitting well. 

The pain and issues were resolved. Appointments management was taken care very nicely.

I had a great experience at GC Dental World with Dr.Chaitanya.. He explained my condition very precisely and in detail. He is genuine and passionate towards his work.The other doctors in the clinic were also clear and friendly towards the patients.i would definitely suggest my family and friends to Dr. Chaitanya.

Had visited to doctor for normal filling in tooth as i had simple hole in my tooth. But he asked me to have X-ray-(200 rs) and than told me you can go for filling 500*2 I don't understand why he was charging it for two! Adding to this he said filling will not work even for week and you will come back to me for root canal in week!!! What kind of filling do you provide which comes out in week ?? And now the biggest trauma was even root canal he said me for 2 teethes which is around 11,500 for each tooth* **** ******* ***** ** ***** *** *** *** ****** *********** ************ I have even done filling and it didn't come out in week for your information!!! I don't think will visit to such dentist ever again
reply_text:
Ms Yashasree it looks like you have not understood the whole treatment plan.Anyway we can only suggest what is needed for you it's your decision to get your treatment done or not.
Please have second opinion if you have any doubts.
Thank you.

review:
The doctor is good, however is extremely expensive. Charges way more than normal rates. Took 4K for tooth extraction, infact it was done by an assistant doctor. (generally any good doctor would charge 2.5K)
Charged 3.5K for root canal (generally any good doctor would charge 2.5K). On top of this added charges like Xray, consultation fee etc - seemed like fleecing by all means.
For the filling first sitting charged 1K, next sitting for the other tooth charged 800, the lady at the reception couldn't explain the logic. Somewhere you feel cheated with the way I was charged. Infact I got a feeling that is it because of the cost that they have incurred by setting up this new fancy clinic. Few other people in our community have a similar feeling and I feel bad that he is loosing a good number of customers.
reply_text:
We would like to clarify your review points one by one for your understanding. First of all, the doctor you are claiming to be an assistant doctor is a certified Oral and Maxillofacial Surgeon with 5 years experience. He is Dr.Ehtesham and listed on practo website as well. The normal charges for a lower wisdom tooth extraction ranges from 3500-5000 depending on the complexity of the case. All our treatment prices are listed on our website. The root canal treatment charges are 3500-4000 and it is a fixed price for any patient. Yes, there could be a variation of Rs.500 compared to other dentists but there is a difference in our quality of service, cost of disposables, digital x-ray (RVG) and high quality materials used for your treatment. And coming to the consultation and x-ray (digital),it  is mandatory fee charged to all patients. Any specialist doctor charges between 200-1500 only for the consultation depending on specialist qualification and experience pertaining to specific field .The fee for fillings range from 800-2000 depending on the amount of decay, location and type of materials used. So, in your first sitting you were charged 1000 based on the decay extent and kind of filling material .Later, we took 800 for the other tooth because it was just a simple filling.
 The feedback given by you was very insensitive and you should have consulted any of our doctors before putting up a review like this.G C Dental World took 20 years to reach the stage where we are now, successfully treating more than 6000 patients. And you can’t degrade the morality of doctor’s in spite of quality treatment you have received without knowing the actual facts.We would be glad to serve you in future also with our quality treatment.

review:
I needed to extract 2 wisdom tooth which was a surgery. The surgeon was very patient and made sure I was comfortable throughout.
The root canal treatment was also done *********.
Dr Chaitanya did the final setting of crown and made sure everything looks perfect. He explained all my doubts really well.

From the country I come, the doctors are highly educated. But their professional ethics are very low.
I been scared of going to dentists after to many wrongful treatments that caused years of pain.
At GC Dental World I have found a confidence and pleasure going to the dentist and looking forward to having all my teeth problems going away once and for all. Thank you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I came in for a missing tooth and I got excellent treatment choices and great bedside manners. 
I got few implants. Surgery was planned meticulous and more importantly painless. I will recommend Dr.Reddy and his team for my family members and friends... 
thank you!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went for tooth extraction for my mom who was very worried about pain. Doctor was very good in explaining the problem. He has a good experience in diagnosis and was very careful in the process. We got the tooth extracted in less than 30 min and a proper guidance was provided on what to follow post extraction. All was well just on the next day and completely recovered. Big thanks to the team.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It's difficult to find doctors / dentists you can trust and have long term continued services with.  Dr.Reddy from GC Dental has built that trust in me and I have continued to use their services for a long time now.  Not just for me but have recommended to family and friends for their services. Professional and friendly staff,  cleanliness  at the clinic are some more positive points to add.

He has been my dentist for 5 years now, went for dental implant and I am amazed with the results, the recovery was quick and the healing resulted back in a healthy life style. His staff also spent time with me I'm explaining the procedure and the queries that I had. Extremely caring and humble staff members.
reply_text: Thank you so much for the kind words sir. Patients like you motivate us to do better. We will be glad to treat you and your family in future also.

review: My back tooth was paining alot and it was moving..doctor has taken x-ray and explained me the treatment very patiently..he has taken out my tooth with minimal pain..later on he has given me all the teeth replacement options very clearly..m very happy with the treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,Tooth Decay,Dental Surgery,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,
review: Chaitanya Sir is brilliant in his work and does everything with utmost perfection and diligence.I had certain complications in my teeth and tried visiting multiple dentists, yet to no avail. then one of my friends suggested me to visit GC dental world and that was it.after that i never visited other dental hospitals.all my problems had a solution here. I recommend to visit sir if you want a one place solution to all your dental problems.

The clinic is pretty old, I expected the clinic to be more clean. The assistant don't have good practice to handle instruments like suction. And the dental expenses are much higher than the average dental care cost in Hyderabad. 
Appointment and opening time of the clinic is same that made me wait for a while.
*** ****** ******** **** ** ******* ***** ********* ***** *** *** *** ***** ******** ******* *** ************
reply_text:
Hello sir 
Hope you had a good day. 
Regarding your reviews, sir the clinic that you visited is definitely a 12 year old setup, but the sterilisation and hygiene standards are top notch and so is the standard of treatment. We did not want to give you a rosy picture or a fake promise regarding your prognosis. 
By looking at your xray, we are very certain that we cannot save the tooth for sure. We are into a practice where we do not do a treatment that does not have a good prognosis at all  and take money from patients. 
Also, we have a bigger and better setup at Khajaguda branch,which you are most welcome to visit, but, irrespective of whatever branch you go to, the treatment plan that is advised will remain the same. You are most welcome to take 2nd expert opinion for the affected tooth.
Thank you for visiting us and we will be happy to serve you again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The expeirence was good as he tried to treat the teeth with minimum damage.earlier  i was told i have to go for filling or may rct...but dr. Chaitanya checked it by other angle and suggested there is no requirement for anything only cleaning is required..thanks

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
*** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ************ *****
A portion of filling was gone from my wisdom tooth, and I consulted him to know what to be done, his advise was to pull it off *** * ***** *** *********** *** he was strongly insisting to do it at that time without a second thought  and he even took ** *********** x-ray ***** *** *** **** ******** *** ** ********** ** I informed him prior that I want to think about tooth extraction.

I consulted another doctor *** ** **** *** ********* ** ********* ***** ******* ** *********** ** **** *** ***** ****** **** The tooth condition is fine.*** **** ** *** ** *** ******** ****** **** * the atmosphere is also unhygenc  *** **** ******** If you loose your tooth it's gone, ****** ******* ******* *** **** **** ** ** ****** **** ******* *** ***** *** **** **** ***** ** **** ********* ** **** ******
reply_text:
Hello sir
X-ray is a very basic diagnostic tool. We cannot come to a diagnostic conclusion in a symptomatic wisdom tooth which already has a deep filling without an X-Ray. Sensitivity for more than a few seconds indicates irreversible pulpitis. We always look at a long term permanent solution. There is always a chance of secondary decay happening underneath the filling and the  only way to confirm it is an X-Ray.
We do not plan extensive treatments like indirect pulp capping or root canal or crown for wisdom teeth. So we suggested you to go for tooth removal as a cost effective long term permanent solution.
We only suggest the treatment options and don't enforce them on our patients. Regarding the money, we charged you only 500 rupees including the consultation charge and X-Ray amount. That also includes my expertise, time and qualification. 
Please understand that for a doctor with more than 22 years of experience and someone who has treated  more than 15,000 patients, this is a very basic amount.
Thank you.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: **** ** **** ****** ********* * **** *********** **** *** ** **** I went for flap surgery, Dr Chaitanya explained me the severity of the problem and how to Take care of my teeth in high standards I felt comfortable during the treatment. The wait time is less. Post treatment, They also call and check the patients on how are they doing and if we need any help. The treatment is worth of cost infact they are costing less than most of other dental clinics in hyd. Thanks to staff and Dr. Chaitanya ! I would strongly recommend it.

I visited GC dental for general cleaning. It was done by DR Kritika who while cleaning disturbed my one upper tooth filling and completely removed it saying food partical. She wasnot accepting that there was a filling, it is only when I started insisting Dr Chaitanya came during cleaning process and confirmed there was a filling. Later they started suggesting root canal treatment for the tooth they removed filling. **** ******** ****** **** **** * ****** ******** *** *** *** * ******* **** ** ****** *********** **** ********* ** ***** ******* *** now I have to go to another dental. This was my first visit to this clinic and didnot expect this bad experience. I will not recommend this clinic to anyone.
reply_text:
Hello mam
Thanks for choosing us to serve you.
Madam, we took your X-Ray and have also sent it you on email yesterday itself.
You already had an existing lesion under the filling that you had, which is very clearly visible in the X-Ray.
We also explained you the same thing yesterday. No filling can come out of the tooth via scaling. It is just not possible and there was already a huge cavity filled with food there.
We request you to get an expert opinion from any other well experienced genuine dentist.
Dr Ritika and also Dr Chaitanya Reddy, who is a senior dental surgeon with more than 20 years of experience explained the same thing to you  yesterday. It is impossible for patients to look into their own mouth and come to a diagnosis. Kindly get an expert opinion before you write a review ma’am.
We will always be more than glad to meet you  and solve your doubts.
Regards,
GC Dental World

review: The doctor took time patiently evaluating the problem, did multiple iterations of getting measurements when we were not satisfied enough with initial trial teeth which really helped us get a good fit. We had tried this whole process at another clinic, by another doctor, so we can truly tell :) Would highly recommend

I visited Dr. Chaitanya for wisdom tooth removal. It was slightly tilted. He removed the tooth very skillfully. I didn't feel any pain even after anaesthesia effect was over and very less bleeding. 

The Doctor and staff are very punctual and patient friendly.

Simply great! Went through smooth surgical extraction of my 2 wisdom teeth and 1 more tooth which had a problem. Great professionalism and post operative care and attention. Undergoing treatment for tooth implant and highly satisfied with the way it is going on. Best experienced doctor with good team of doctors. Strongly recommend.

I have used Dr. Chaitnya's services earlier too for myslef and my father. I find him to be both knowledgeable and skillful with his practice. This visit was for toothache and I had to get a rotten tooth extracted. The best part about the extraction was that it was painless and I did not have to take any pain killer even after the extraction.

It was a satisfying exp. WL definitely recommend to others. Appointment timings have to be adhered to though. The most pleasant thing about the treatment was Revatis welcoming smile. She has a very pleasant personality which is. Nice fr visiting patients.

ok.I had seen many good reviews and travelled more than 25km . I don know still what kind kind of treatment they did for smile care treatment . I feel GC dental would have done follow up at least SMS or email will help to continue with them, otherwise I feel they did wrong treatment and no trust in them.

Overall treatment is incomplete.

My overall experience was Nice. Doctor is very cordial and explain in detail about the treatment. I have undergone implant treatment and the complete process was very smooth. If someone is looking for good dentist, should try out this place once and I am sure you won't get disappointed.

I had a problem of bleeding gums whenever I brush.. My mouth use to smell very badly.. I visited this clinic on recommendation of my clinic. Gud experience d doctor gave a good suggestions of cleaning. Dr. Gayathri have done the job very precisely. Thank you so much.

I had problem in one of my teeth and sir suggested for root canal treatment because the infection had already reached into the lower part of teeth.  I had total 4 sittings and it was a painless experience except a little bit pain when root canal cleaning was done. I read excellent reviews on Google and believe me those were true. I am going to recommend sir for any problem related to teeth.

The treatment is fine and I am very satisfied with the overall process and the doctor has got much experience in this field and he explains every bit of the treatment process in detail.More over the technology used in the lab is highly sophisticated and economical.Overall I am very much satisfied by the treatment process.

Implant treatment being the latest and an expensive one I had been to almost 7-8 clinics in Hyderabad to enquire about the treatment. I had all my trust only in Dr chaitanya reddy after meeting him for the first time itself .he really has profound knowledge of the subject and is very straightforward and honest. The procedure was very painless and all the hygiene and sterilisation was very well maintained. I strongly recommend to all and really am very thankful and satisfied.

Excellent experience. Very cooperative staff. The receptionist also cooperated very well to adjust my timings for all sittings due to my odd working hours. Very transparent and straightforward payment procedure. Will recommend to all and Dr chaitanya reddy is my family dentist now.

Well doctor was nice and welcoming, he  nicely explained the problem and also solution to it, I feel he didn't did any other procedures to my other tooth he just recommended for future , also it was nice experience, the things happened very smoothly
All the dentist here are knowledgeable and friendly. They explain the procedure well. Well equipped facility. A bit expensive but worth visiting.

i got my root canal treatment in GC dental world, first time it was little painful and i was apprehensive, later doctor counselled me well and comforted me. the way they treated me is quiet appreciable. Thanks to doctor

I came here with much pain.they advised rct I was scared.the doc and the staff explained me.the treatment was done in a painless manner.and the crown looks same as my natural teeth. Thanks to the team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Can be better, not very friendly, it wouldn't hurt to smile little ********* ******* **********which is not expected
reply_text:
Hello sir,

Thank you for the feedback. It makes us better practitioners.

We saw you one year back and advised you to go for removal of both your lower wisdom teeth as they are impacted and posing a threat to ideal oral hygiene. Now when you saw us after a year and the situation has worsened. As advised by our senior doctor ,the impacted wisdom teeth are also causing harm to your other two essential molar teeth. You being very young in age, this is a matter of concern and we were really worried about the probable damage to other two teeth of yours that might be caused by your impacted wisdom teeth.
We will be very glad to serve you in future .Please call and book an appointment to have a seamless experience.

review: The doctor was really helpful and the treatment was really well executed in a speedy way.....it was my first time with a dentist and the experience was really pleasant and smooth

He is Friendly and will tell the proper thing and cause of problem.
Best Recommended.

review: The environment of the clinic is really good with maintaining good hygiene.The staffs and the assistants are so friendly.For me it is my first time tooth extraction but the doc did not give me a chance to feel  nervous.It takes around 30-45 mins time for the whole process.It was a nice experience for me.

I'll be very honest - due to other health issues I cancelled a previously set appointment at the last moment - I'm from USA and now reside in Hyderabad - unlike the American clinics - I suffered no financial or cancellation fee as is the case with most dental clinics in The State.  Dr Reddy and his Staff were not happy with my cancellations - but nonetheless were courteous and prompt in finding a slot for me when the need arose again.
